context: I failed to address your concerns promptly
letter:
Dear [Client's Name],

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to express my sincerest apologies for my failure to address your concerns in a timely manner. I understand how important your feedback is, and it was never my intention to leave you feeling overlooked or undervalued.

I truly regret any frustration or inconvenience this may have caused you. Your satisfaction is of utmost priority to me, and I am committed to ensuring that your concerns are taken seriously moving forward. I have taken this situation to heart and am making changes to improve our communication process so that we can serve you better.

Thank you for your understanding and patience during this time. I appreciate the opportunity to correct my oversight and will strive to restore your confidence in my services.

Please feel free to reach out if there is anything you would like to discuss further. Your feedback is invaluable, and I am here to listen.

Warm regards,

[Your Name]  
[Your Position]  
[Your Company]  
[Your Contact Information]
